alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 8:31PM CDT until April 02 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Little Osage River near Horton affecting Vernon County. For the Little Osage River Basin...including Horton, Fulton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Osage River near Horton. * WHEN...Until late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 41.0 feet, minor flooding affects low lying areas near the gage site and farmland along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 41.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue falling to 31.2 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 41.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. Friday evening at 845 PM CDT.
